alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:22AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Winona and eastern Fillmore Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fountain, or 7 miles north of Preston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Preston around 1230 AM CDT. Lanesboro around 1250 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Henrytown, Saratoga, Choice, Old Barn Campground, Isinours, Highway 30 And County 74, Peterson, Troy, Newburg and Arendahl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
